definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the therapeutic effect of holmium-laser on ureteroceles.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鈥激光治療輸尿管口囊腫的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of Ho∶YAG laser in the treatment of superficial bladder cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鈥激光治療淺表性膀胱癌的方法及療效。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the method of transurethral resection by Holmium laser for condyloma acuminata in the urethra.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察鈥激光經尿道治療尿道內尖銳溼疣的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical efficiency and side-effect in the patients with pyogenic granuloma treated with Ho laser.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察鈥激光治療化膿性肉芽腫的療效和不良反應。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the therapeutic effect of superficial bladder cancer treated with Ho∶YAG laser.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察鈥激光治療表淺膀胱癌的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse clinical therapeutic effective in patients with urethral condyloma acuminatum(CA) with holmium laser.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析鈥激光腔內治療尿道內尖銳溼疣的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the experiences in nursing cooperation during the ureteroscopic holmium laser lithotripsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討輸尿管鏡下鈥激光碎石術的護理配合經驗。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the curative effect of endourological treatment of pediatric urethral hemangioma with holmium laser.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腔內鈥激光治療尿道血管瘤的療效。

definition: to weave/to lay warp for weaving/silk thread for weaving/variant of 紉|纫, to sew/to stitch/thread
